mapper.select: /* 로그인 회원정보 조회 */ SELECT cust_seq , cust_id as cust_id , cust_id as user_id , cust_nm , email_id , cust_clsf_cd , date_format(ins_dtm,'%Y-%m-%d') as ins_dt FROM ev_cust_mst where cust_id = #{user_id} and cust_pw = #{user_pw} and cust_sts_cd = '105001'

/* 회원정보 조회 */ SELECT cust_seq , cust_id as cust_id , cust_id as user_id , cust_clsf_cd , cust_sts_cd , (select case when #{lang} = 'en' then cd_nm_en else cd_nm end from ev_comm_code where cd_id = a.cust_sts_cd) as cust_sts_nm , cust_nm , company_nm , dept_nm , rep_nm , posn_nm , gender_cd , age_cd , hp_no , tel_no , email_id , country_cd , city_nm , zip_code , addr_1 , addr_2 , visit_pups_cd , rcmder_cust_id , agree_1 , agree_dtm_1 , date_format(DATE_ADD(agree_dtm_1, INTERVAL 24 MONTH),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as agree1_dtm_fm , date_format(DATE_ADD(agree_dtm_1, INTERVAL 24 MONTH), case when #{lang} = 'en' then '%Y-%m-%d' else '%Y년%m월%d일' end) as agree1_dt_end , date_format(DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(agree_dtm_1, INTERVAL 24 MONTH), INTERVAL 1 DAY), case when #{lang} = 'en' then '%Y-%m-%d' else '%Y년%m월%d일' end) as agree1_dt_expr , agree_2 , agree_dtm_2 , agree_3 , agree_dtm_3 , google_email , naver_email , kakao_email , facebook_email , reg_provider , date_format(ins_dtm,'%Y-%m-%d') as ins_dt , date_format(ins_dtm,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as ins_dtm , category1 , nvl((select cd_val1 from ev_comm_code where cd_id = a.category1),'#!') as category1_value , category2 , category3 , tiemzone_cd FROM ev_cust_mst a where cust_id = #{cust_id}

/* 회원정보 조회 */ SELECT cust_seq , cust_id as cust_id , cust_id as user_id , cust_clsf_cd , cust_sts_cd , (select cd_nm from ev_comm_code where cd_id = a.cust_sts_cd) as cust_sts_nm , cust_nm , company_nm , dept_nm , rep_nm , posn_nm , gender_cd , age_cd , hp_no , tel_no , email_id , country_cd , city_nm , zip_code , addr_1 , addr_2 , visit_pups_cd , rcmder_cust_id , agree_1 , agree_dtm_1 , date_format(DATE_ADD(agree_dtm_1, INTERVAL 24 MONTH),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as agree1_dtm_fm , date_format(DATE_ADD(agree_dtm_1, INTERVAL 24 MONTH),'%Y년%m월%d일') as agree1_dt_end , date_format(DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(agree_dtm_1, INTERVAL 24 MONTH), INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y년%m월%d일') as agree1_dt_expr , agree_2 , agree_dtm_2 , agree_3 , agree_dtm_3 , google_email , naver_email , kakao_email , facebook_email , reg_provider , date_format(ins_dtm,'%Y-%m-%d') as ins_dt , category1 , nvl((select cd_val1 from ev_comm_code where cd_id = a.category1),'#!') as category1_value , category2 , category3 FROM ev_cust_mst a where cust_seq = #{cust_seq}
